title:
Offer valid on single movie admission ticket
Must keep ticket stub to redeem offer
See details for more information
description:
Offer valid on single movie admission ticket
Must keep ticket stub to redeem offer
See details for more information
offer:
Offer valid on single movie admission ticket purchase ONLY at participating theaters. To verify the redemption, you must submit a picture of a ticket stub generated at the Box Office or theater kiosk.

The ticket stub MUST include:
-Name of Movie
-Time and date of showing
-Price of ticket
-Auditorium number

Participating movie theaters include:
-AMC Theatres
-Regal Cinemas
-United Artist Theatres
-Edwards Theatres

Offer does not include:
-Any print at home tickets
-Any movie theater concession purchases
-Any electronic tickets

title:
Any Brand - Limited time only
Excludes all flavored & non-dairy varieties
description:
Any Brand - Limited time only
Excludes all flavored & non-dairy varieties
offer:
LIMITED TIME OFFER!

Redeem our Any Brand milk offer ($.50) along with ANY 2 additional offers to earn a $.50 Bonus! You'll also earn cash from the 2nd and 3rd offers. Hurry as our milk offer & bonus both expire on Sunday night!

Offer valid on Any Brand of white milk, 1 gallon size only. Offer includes whole, skim, non-fat, low-fat (1%), and reduced-fat (2%) milk varieties. This does not include any flavored milk varieties or non-dairy milk varieties.

If you scan a product in store and it doesn't match the offer but you believe it is eligible, please send two pictures to addupc@ibotta.com of:
1) the front of the product
2) the UPC barcode on the product. 
If it is an eligible item, we will add it to our database so you can redeem it successfully.
